data.title: Lana Gomez’s biography: who is Sebastian Maniscalco’s wife?
data.meta_description: Discover how American painter Lana Gomez met comedian Sebastian Maniscalco, their wedding, her art collaborations with Kelly Wearstler, and more details.
data.text:
Lana Gomez is one of the top painters in America. Her art has appeared in prominent magazines like InStyle and Kelly Wearstler’s book, Hue. Many also know Lana through her marriage with American comedian/actor Sebastian Maniscalco. He has released six comedy specials and acted in the Green Book (2018), The Irishman (2019), The Super Mario Bros. Movie (2023), and About My Father (2023).

Besides being a professional painter, Sebastian Maniscalco's wife is an interior decorator. Lana Gomez knows how to balance two careers besides being a mother and a wife. Her husband has praised her in numerous press interviews and in his standup routines.

Profile summary

Full nameLana GomezGenderFemaleDate of birthApril 23, 1983Birth signTaurusAge40 years (as of 2023)BirthplaceNaples, Florida, USACurrent residenceLos Angeles, California, USANationalityAmericanEthnicityWhiteHeight5'7" (170 cm)Weight123 (56 kg)Hair colorBlondeEye colorBrownFatherBarry Gomez (deceased)MotherSimone Lutgert GomezSiblings2BrotherRodney WeissSisterHeather DockweilerReligionJudaismSexualityStraightMarital statusMarriedSpouseSebastian ManiscalcoChildren2Alma materRollins College, Florida Gulf Coast University, University of TennesseeProfessionPainter, interior decoratorNet worth$1 millionInstagram@lanagomez

Lana Gomez's biography

Lana Gomez was not a celebrity before she married Sebastian Maniscalco. Many knew her after the two became a couple because Sebastian Maniscalco was already an established comedian in the US by the time he married.

How old is Lana Gomez?

Lana Gomez's age is 40 years as of 2023. She was born on April 23, 1983, in Naples, Florida, USA.

Who is Lana Gomez's father?

Lana Gomez was born to Barry Gomez and Simone Lutgert Gomez. Her parents divorced when she was 9, and her father died in 2001. Lana Gomez's mother, a certified philanthropist, married Scott Lutgert in 2003.

What nationality is Lana Gomez?

She is an American with a white ethnic background and Spanish-Italian descent. Lana is a descendant of the Gomez family, who fled to America after the Spanish Inquisition.

Their family ancestor, Luis Gomez, established the Gomez Mill House in 1714 in Newburgh, New York, and it remains one of the earliest known Jewish dwellings in North America and one of the oldest homes on the National Register of Historic Places.

Who are Lana Gomez's siblings?

She grew up in Naples, Florida, and Memphis, Tennessee, alongside her two siblings, Rodney Weiss (brother) and Heather Dockweiler (sister).

Educational background

After high school, Lana Gomez attended Rollins College from 2001 to 2002 and Florida Gulf Coast University from 2003 and 2004. She also enrolled in a watercolor painting course at the University of Tennessee in 2004.

In 2006, Lana obtained a Bachelor of Arts in Studio Art, majoring in Fine and Studio Arts. While studying at the University of Tennessee, Lana Gomez practiced her watercolor painting skills on her dorm and apartment walls.

What does Lana Gomez do for a living?

Sebastian Maniscalco's wife is a painter and interior decorator.

Her parents, especially her father, encouraged her to pursue a career in arts. The late Barry Gomez was also passionate about painting and crafts. When Lana was young, he taught her how to paint on a canvas.

After graduation from the university, Lana moved to Los Angeles, California, to pursue her dream of becoming a professional painter.

Gomez struggled for a few years before meeting Kelly Wearstler in California. She was the first renowned interior designer to appreciate her work. Considering Kelly's reputation in the field, this meant the world to Lana.

She worked with Wearstler on several projects, including a mural in Wearstler's design studio. The mural-sized painting was featured in Wearstler's book, Hue.

Working with Wearstler increased her popularity. In 2010, Gomez was invited to work on a 10-foot guitar sculpture for Gibson Guitar Town on the Sunset Strip in West Hollywood.

Some years later, Lana opened her showroom in West Hollywood, California, and was tasked to paint a 10-foot guitar sculpture for Gibson Guitar Town in 2012.

Lana Gomez's art pieces, such as the Greystone Mansion, are displayed in Beverly Hills. Her art has also appeared in high-profile publications such as House Beautiful, Lonny, Los Angeles Confidential, HuffPost Style, Luxe Magazine, The New Yorker, Vogue, and InStyle.

Where can you buy Lana Gomez's art?

She displays her work on her official business website. For pricing, commissions, brand partnerships, media inquiries, and any other inquiries, you can contact her via Lanagomezart@gmail.com.

How did Sebastian and Lana meet?

They met at a gym, where they shared the same trainer. Sebastian had asked the trainer if he trains any good-looking girls, and that's when Lana got brought up.

The comedian opened up about meeting Lana in September 2015 during an appearance on The Fighter and The Kid podcast. Sebastian scheduled a time to train right after his future wife, and he went all out for their first introduction.

The comedian showered, gelled his hair, and even applied baby oil in preparation for meeting his future wife. While at the gym, he saw Lana, and they started talking. She was on the treadmill when he joked, "You want to go out with this?"

At first, Lana Gomez rejected Sebastian with a scathing joke. She said she "didn't go out with anybody that has over 13% body fat" and would think about it. She eventually agreed to go out with him. They dated for some time before making it official.

When was Sebastian Maniscalco’s wedding with Lana Gomez?

Gomez was 30, and Sebastian Maniscalco was 43 when they tied the knot on August 24, 2013.

How many kids do Lana Gomez and Maniscalco have?

Lana and Sebastian Maniscalco have two children. They had their daughter, Serafina Simone Maniscalco, on May 12, 2017, and their son, Caruso Jack Maniscalco, on June 15, 2019, in Los Angeles.

Serafina is the name of Sebastian's grandmother, while Simone is the name of Lana's mom. Meanwhile, their son's name was inspired by Hotel Caruso on the Amalfi coast, where the couple spent their honeymoon.

Where does Lana Gomez live?

Lana Gomez lives in West Hollywood city in Los Angeles County, California, USA, with her spouse and kids. She used her interior design and painting skills to completely transform her home, which she and Maniscalco purchased in 2014.

What is Lana Gomez’s net worth?

Lana Maniscalco's net worth is guesstimated at around $1 million. She has earned quite a fortune as a painter and interior designer. Sebastian Maniscalco's wife owns an art showroom in West Hollywood where she displays her work.

What is Lana Gomez's religion?

She is a Sephardic, and her connection to Judaism comes from the morals, lessons, and family values she incorporates into her daily life and artwork.

Social media presence

Sebastian Maniscalco's wife has a verified Instagram page, @lanagomez, where she shares videos and pictures of her new projects and artwork. She also has a Facebook account, @LanaGomezArt, and an X (Twitter) handle, @LanaGomez.

Facts about Lana Gomez

Sebastian Maniscalco's wife loves to paint with her daughter, Serafina. The girl began showing interest in art and painting at a young age.

She and Maniscalco are both charitable. The couple has shared some of their philanthropic experiences on Instagram, including the support they gave Jessica Seinfeld's Good+ Foundation in 2017.

Lana loves to travel with her husband. They travel together to his numerous comedy shows, and she is often present when Sebastian Maniscalco receives awards for his comedy specials.

Lana Gomez inspires many who want to be successful artists like her. Her works are famous in Hollywood and have been featured in numerous magazines. Being Sebastian Maniscalco's wife and a mother to two does not stop her from pursuing her career.

Legit.ng shared Amy Askren's biography. She is a professional realtor based in the USA. Amy is also popularly known as the spouse of Ben Askren, a retired MMA fighter and wrestler.

The couple has been married for over a decade and has three children: two daughters and one son.

Source: Legit.ng
